arts.ttl: Juventus Star Forward Explains Reasons Behind Red-Hot Form
arts.sum: Timothy Weah's renaissance following an underwhelming first season at Juventus continued yesterday against Torino. The USMNT forward opened the scoring to set the tone for Bianconeri's comfortable 2-0 home win in the latest edition of the famous Derby della Mole. The post Juventus Star Forward Explains Reasons Behind Red-Hot Form appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Juventus 2-0 Torino (9 de Nov., 2024) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Tim Weah scores for Juve as dad George looks on
arts.sum: Tim Weah's first-half goal for Juventus in a 2-0 derby win over Torino on Saturday marked the United States international's third goal in four Serie A matches.

arts.ttl: Man Utd target Juventus' Danilo - Sunday's gossip
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim wants to bring Juventus' Danilo to Manchester United, Sporting's Ousmane Diomande is a target for Arsenal and Real Madrid want Sergio Ramos back.
